title: What are good examples of real estate proposals? - Quora

response.answer_text: Real estate is like any other asset. There are good and there a bad one. The market for property in a country or city can go up and down. Just get a property with a quality feature that can stand out the test of time. This means that when the market goes downs. The property has a nice distinctive feature that future generation will appreciate the place too anyway when the market is in the up again. This feature could be a nice vista, a good layout, etctera. Last but not least, the devils is in the detail and is in that cannot be seen easily. Look for traces of damp (fear water), roofing tiles that are disjointed, noisy Neighbours, ….Find a way to investigate what can go wrong and that is not immediately visible on your first visit.
